department.dept_long_name: Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences

course.title: Analytical and Field Methods in Geobiology
course.meeting_text: Tu., at 2:30, and a weekly three-hour lab to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: David T. Johnston and Ann Pearson
course.description: Introduction to geobiological research methods: We will learn low temperature geochemical techniques, light stable isotope mass-spectrometry, and other microbiology methods commonly used in geobiological research. The focus will be on the cycling of biogeochemical elements (O, C, S, and Fe) in marine sediments throughout Earth history. This is a lab-based course that will be complemented with lectures.
